scripts.dev: npm run clean; npm run dev:build-main && npm run dev:serve
scripts.dev:build-main: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build src/main/main.js --target electron --out-dir out/main
scripts.dev:build-renderer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build src/renderer/index.html --target electron --out-dir out/renderer --public-url ./
scripts.dev:serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel src/renderer/index.html --target electron --out-dir out/renderer --public-url ./
scripts.start: npm run dev:build-main &&npm run dev:build-renderer && npm run electron
scripts.package:build-main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/main/main.js --target node --out-dir out/main
scripts.package:build-renderer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/renderer/index.html --target electron --out-dir out/renderer --public-url ./
scripts.package: npm run clean;rm -r dist;npm run package:build-main&&npm run package:build-renderer&&mkdir dist&&node script/packaging.js
